notes.title: Note:
notes.note1: The add-on service charges, convenience fee, and the discount you have received using a coupon code are non-refundable.
notes.note2: Airlines stop accepting cancellation/change requests 4 - 72 hours before flight departure, depending on the airline. The airline fee is based on an automated interpretation of airline fare rules. Rehlat doesn't guarantee the accuracy of this information.
notes.note3: The change/cancellation fee may also vary based on fluctuations in currency conversion rates. For the exact cancellation/change fee, please call us at our customer care number.
